_header: The sight which first my heart did strain

OxfCCC4.First Lines:
The sight which ferst my hart dyd strayneWhen þat your
                    servaunt I becam…
OxfCCC4.Last Lines:
…by iust Iugement my silfe I damnto have dysdayn to have
                    dysdayne
OxfCCC4.Note:
Text written three times, each with staves of notation for a different
                    part.
